name: Cleaner Google
description:
This style is really clean and simplified look for www.google.com.

You need to have ProFontWindows (http://www.tobias-jung.de/seekingprofont/) or Monaco font installed, or you have to modify the style to use some other font.

Changed 2007-06-08 (v0.21):
* Added Googel logo on front page
* Small visual enhancements

Changed 2007-06-08 (v0.20):
* domain changed to url-prefix and url to prevent this skin to mess up for example Google Reader

Changed 2007-06-07:
* Cleaner code with comments
* Removes ads
* Small visual enhancements
